channel.title: Hybridscape Help
channel.description:
Hi =-) I've been toying with different sources, and it seems hybridscape is the most stable. However I only tested hybridscape on the mopar client, I then downloaded the hybridscape beta revision 16. However, whenever someone tries to connect, they get auto-kicked and from then on it says they're already logged in.
Whenever I tried to log on, the same thing happened. I then created a char file for myself, and I get the error:
"Invalid loginserver requested. Please try using a different world"
Could anyone please help me out a bit with this? Any help would be mucho appreciated ^+^

item.title: Hybridscape Help
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

Hi =-) I’ve been toying with different sources, and it seems hybridscape is the most stable. However I only tested hybridscape on the mopar client, I then downloaded the hybridscape beta revision 16. However, whenever someone tries to connect, they get auto-kicked and from then on it says they’re already logged in.

Whenever I tried to log on, the same thing happened. I then created a char file for myself, and I get the error:

“Invalid loginserver requested. Please try using a different world”

Could anyone please help me out a bit with this? Any help would be mucho appreciated ^+^

Read full topic
